description: The round payoff this round was 1. You, Kate chose to play option 2.John chose to play option 2. You received a payoff of -1000.

The game's outcome heavily depends on anticipating the other player's action and understanding the round input, because the payoff structure incentivizes cooperation (both choosing option 1) to avoid negative payoffs, but also presents an opportunity for exploitation (one choosing option 2 while the other chooses option 1).

The other player's default action is option 1, but they may deviate based on their insight into your strategy or to test your actions, because in the remembered round, both players chose option 2, indicating a potential for adaptive behavior.
